name: Ext_R2_Questionnaire_subjectType
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Questionnaire.subjectType for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Questionnaire.subjectType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Questionnaire|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Resource that can be subject of QuestionnaireResponse
element.definition: Identifies the types of subjects that can be the subject of the questionnaire.
element.comment: `Questionnaire.subjectType` maps to R4B `Questionnaire.subjectType`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Resource that can be subject of QuestionnaireResponse
element.definition: Identifies the types of subjects that can be the subject of the questionnaire.
element.comment: `Questionnaire.subjectType` maps to R4B `Questionnaire.subjectType`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: One of the resource types defined as part of FHIR.
